CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Distribution stage positioned above or below the Paid Consumption stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Distribution stage is positioned {above} the Paid Consumption stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to End Users?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to End Users is {22072}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Generation?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Generation is {97540}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Billed Consumption?
VE.A: The value of stage Billed Consumption is {13985}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Generation, with a value of {97540}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Paid Consumption, with a value of {11310}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Distribution to stage Delivered to End Users?
SC.A: Decreased by {15661} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Distribution to stage Delivered to End Users.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission?
SC.A: Decreased by {37734} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 48769? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Generation} stage has {97540}, the {Post-Transmission} stage has {59806}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 29902? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Delivered to End Users} stage has {22072}, the {Billed Consumption} stage has {13985}, the {Paid Consumption} stage has {11310}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 18028 and 29902? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Delivered to End Users} stage has {22072}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, or from stage Delivered to End Users to Billed Consumption?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Transmission} to {Post-Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission, or from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Generation} to stage {Post-Transmission} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Generation} and {Post-Transmission} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Billed Consumption} and {Paid Consumption} stages.
